About Me

A little about myself...

BIO

I was born in Orono, MN and my family were the owners of Sailors Wold Marina and Boat Club on Lake Minnetonka. My passions include music, sailing, and not having to write another one of these.

College

U of San Diego, Kansas U to Seattle P.U

Travel

Egypt, Nepal, Indonesia, Peru

FreeLance
